results.title: Arthur and Corinne Cantrill interview with Fiona Trigg [excerpt]
results.brief_description:
Arthur and Corinne Cantrill have been making films together since 1960. Initially focusing on documentaries about art they moved on to experimental film in 1969. From 1971 to 2000 they edited and published Cantrills Filmnotes, a journal on film and video art. Their film work and publishing are well-known internationally and have been represented in several film collections.

In this interview with Fiona Trigg, ACMI Exhibitions Assistant Curator, Arthur and Corinne talk about their early days of expanded cinema and their technical and creative processes.
results.title_for_label: Arthur and Corinne Cantrill interview with Fiona Trigg [excerpt]
results.description:
Arthur and Corinne Cantrill have been making films together since 1960. Initially focusing on documentaries about art they moved on to experimental film in 1969. From 1971 to 2000 they edited and published Cantrills Filmnotes, a journal on film and video art. Their film work and publishing are well-known internationally and have been represented in several film collections.

In this interview with Fiona Trigg, ACMI Exhibitions Assistant Curator, Arthur and Corinne talk about their early days of expanded cinema and their technical and creative processes.

results.title: Economics
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
The economist is presented as a sort of management advisor to business or government. Outlines what is meant by “forces in the economy” through the activities of people. It then becomes possible to suggest the need for an understanding of these “forces” so that they may be kept operating satisfactorily. The role of the economist in business is shown.
results.description:

results.title: Pharmacy
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing the pharmacist at work in the preparation of preventative and curative medicines. Discusses careers in the corner pharmacy, in a large pharmaceutical company or in a hospital.

results.title: Geologist and geophysicist
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film designed to show the work of the geologist and geophysicist. Explains the university study required, and shows the application to work in mineral exploration, and other fields.

results.title: Physiotherapy
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing how physiotherapists assist patients to recover the use of limbs after injuries, etc. Demonstrates various techniques used and shows training briefly.

results.title: Mechanical engineering
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Shows the many activities of the mechanical engineer in designing and constructing machinery of every kind. The student needs to be good at mathematics and science. Shows him involved in the study of technical drawing, principles of air conditioning, of refrigeration, internal combustion, jet engines and how they perform under various conditions.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Shows the many activities of the mechanical engineer in designing and constructing machinery of every kind. The student needs to be good at mathematics and science. Shows him involved in the study of technical drawing, principles of air conditioning, of refrigeration, internal combustion, jet engines and how they perform under various conditions.

results.title: Journalism
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A straightforward account of a sometimes over-glamorised profession. The copy boy carries out menial tasks; the cadet learns how to report crime, general, parliamentary, financial and sporting news. The erratic hours of work are shown to apply to radio and television journalism as well as to newspaper work, and the basic demands of the work are similar.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A straightforward account of a sometimes over-glamorised profession. The copy boy carries out menial tasks; the cadet learns how to report crime, general, parliamentary, financial and sporting news. The erratic hours of work are shown to apply to radio and television journalism as well as to newspaper work, and the basic demands of the work are similar.
